name: Evolv Technology, Inc.
description: Evolv Technology, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced security screening solutions leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning. Founded in 2013, Evolv aims to enhance public safety while improving the visitor experience in high-traffic venues such as stadiums, airports, and corporate offices. The company has developed the Evolv Express system, a touchless and efficient screening solution that allows for a seamless flow of people without the need for traditional metal detectors. This innovative technology not only accelerates the screening process but also reduces the need for physical contact, addressing both security and health concerns. Evolv's technology has been deployed in various high-profile environments, including major sports venues and entertainment centers. The company is committed to revolutionizing the security landscape through continuous innovation, making it easier for organizations to protect their customers and employees while maintaining an inviting atmosphere. As the demand for smart, secure spaces grows, Evolv Technology is at the forefront of this evolution, providing cutting-edge solutions that adapt to the changing needs of the world.
